name: amasty/module-one-step-checkout-core
description: One Step Checkout Core by Amasty

suggest.amasty\/checkout-graph-ql: Install checkout-graph-ql module to be able to use One Step Checkout GraphQL queries.
suggest.amasty\/module-mixin-rewrite-patch: Install mixin rewrite patch if you have a problem with extension on Magento 2.4.2 version on Checkout
